name: drake-equation-website
description: website to demonstrate the drake equation
author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>

scripts.build: run-s clean && run-p build:copy build:pages build:scripts build:styles && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build:debug: run-s clean && run-p build:copy build:pages-debug build:scripts-debug build:styles && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.build:copy: cp .nojekyll dist && cp CNAME dist && cp -R assets dist/assets && cp -R node_modules/nce-common dist/nce-common && cp -R node_modules/relly dist/relly
scripts.build:scripts: browserify source/main.tsx -p [ tsify ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t uglifyify > dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js && uglifyjs -cm < dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js > dist/main.bundle.js
